INTELLIGENCE    AND   
SECURITY  STUDIES  
ABUAD  
   UTME  
(i) ABUJA – As in Political Science.  
(ii) LASU requires 'O' level credit passes in Mathematics, English 
Language and three (3) other subjects from Economics, 
Government, Commerce, Geography, Christian Religious 
Studies, Islamic Studies, Accounts, Yoruba or a Science 
subject.  
(iii) ILORIN requires at le ast two (2) Social Science subjects and 
‘O’ level pass in Mathematics.  
(iv) AAU, BENIN and DELSU require ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Mathematics.  
(v) ILORIN accepts five (5) 'O' level credit passes from Arts, 
Science or Social Science Subjects  
(vi) ABSU and CALABAR accept ‘O’ level pass in Mathematics.  
(vii) IBADAN accepts five (5) 'O' level credits passes from Arts, 
Sciences or Social /Sciences.  
(viii) FED-LAFIA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Government and any two (2) of 
Economics, Commerce, Hi story, Islamic Studies or Christian 
Religious Studies.  
(ix) DELSU and BOWEN require five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics, and any two (2) 
Social Science subjects plus any other subject.  
(x) LAGOS requires English Language, Mathematics, and any two 
(2) of Economics, Government/History, Civic Education and 
Geography and any one (1) of Literature in English, Christian 
Religious Studies / Islamic Studies and any Nigerian 
Language.  
(xi) REDEEMERS requires five (5) 'O level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics and three (3) additional 
subjects in Social; Sciences or Arts.  
(xii) AAUA requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government/History, and any two (2) Social / 
Science or Arts subjects.  
(xiii) ABU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Government or History, Economics, Geography, 
Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies and at least ‘O’ 
level pass in Mathematics.  
(xiv) KASU requires 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics.  
(xv) ABSU same as in Political Science.
